name: Jelly Cat
description:
Ever heard of cats being liquid? Well, a scientist wants to take this literally by creating a true liquid cat, that is how you became what you are. Your goal is to get bigger by absorbing fish snacks which are spread throughout the lab, get out of the lab area and join the other jelly cats in the living room, it seems like kitty heaven!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Climb sticky walls by jumping onto them and moving with WASD
  • Jump off sticky walls by pressing Space

How to play:

  • Try to reach the top by the cat door
  • You need to fill your blobbyness meter to the max by eating fish pellats (you only need to find one)
  • reaching the cat door while at max blobbyness you will be able to exit
  • avoid falling on the ground
